DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of Near-Infrared Technology can guide the laparoscopic resection of hypervascular neoplasms of the pancreas.
DOC.brief_title: Near Infrared Technology and Laparoscopic Resection of Pancreatic Lesions: the COLPAN Project
DOC.criteria: age between 18 and 80 diagnosis of hypervascular pancreatic neoplasms to be treated with laparoscopic surgery allergy to indocyanine green or other vital stains, indium, shellfish chronic kidney insufficiency chronic hepatopathy hyperthyroidism, thyroid adenomas
